attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Robert Anderson spent 170 days in prison from 26th July 2006 till the 19th January 2007, He was released when the procurator fiscal conseeded he was set up, while on Bail conditions for charges he was acquitted of on the 1st of April 2008. He lost out on 6 months of family life, Is this right? please help us to see justice done as its ridiculous that people can make a complaint and someone is put in prison for lies!!! and the procurator fiscal turn a blind eye.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
